projects.name: Heritage Hub
projects.subtitle: INTERACTIVE 3D MUSEUM EXPERIENCE
projects.description: A digital platform for exploring 3D-scanned cultural objects. Users can interact with artifacts, examine key details, and learn about their history, materials, and provenance.

projects.name: IntelliQuiz
projects.subtitle: AI-POWERED QUIZ MAKER APP
projects.description: This web application uses OpenAI to generate questions based on text or PDF files. You can attempt the quiz on the site or take it with you as a PDF.

projects.name: Bite Balance
projects.subtitle: NUTRITION TRACKER WITH GOAL MONITORING
projects.description: Track daily meals and macros with precision. Bite Balance uses real-time data from the Nutritionix API to help visualize calorie intake, set health goals, and monitor progress.

projects.name: Cash Flow
projects.subtitle: PERSONAL BUDGET ASSISTANT
projects.description: A budgeting mobile application to track personal expenses in a user-friendly dashboard. Add accounts, log transactions, set spending limits; all in one place.
